description: Your awesome NativeScript plugin for using fontawesome icons
name: nativescript-fontawesome
readme: # Nativescript FontAwesome ## A simpler way to use FontAwesome icons with NativeScript ## Install ``` tns plugin add nativescript-fontawesome ``` [click here to Download fontawesome-webfont.ttf](https://github.com/moayadnajd/nativescript-fontawesome/blob/master/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.ttf) or download from [fontawesome website](http://fontawesome.io/) * Place font icon `.ttf` file in `app/fonts`, like below: ``` app/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.ttf ``` * call the init function in the you'r app.ts: ``` import { Fontawesome } from 'nativescript-fontawesome'; Fontawesome.init(); ``` ### Usage ``` ``` ## Credits [nativescript-fonticon](https://github.com/NathanWalker/nativescript-fonticon)

scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-fontawesome && cd ../src
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-fontawesome && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
